transcript: 26-year-old male motor vehicle accident victim with head injury and spinal cord injury. Patient was unconscious at scene. Head injury with possible skull fracture. Spinal cord injury at C5-C6 level. Patient is intubated. Blood pressure is 110/70. Heart rate is 105. Need immediate trauma activation for MVA with spinal injury.
activation_page: STAT trauma activation for 26-year-old male MVA victim with head injury and spinal cord injury. Patient unconscious, intubated. Immediate trauma team activation required.
